text: Eduardo Lopez Riaza (born December 29, 1964 in Pozuelo de Alarc√≥n) is a wheelchair basketball athlete from Spain. He has a physical disability: he is a 1 point wheelchair basketball player. He played wheelchair basketball at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. His team was third. They beat the United States 66-60 to finish third. == References == Category:Living people Category:1963 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Spanish wheelchair basketball players Category:1 point player Category:Sportspeople from Madrid
title: Eduardo Lopez Riaza
